nodes.title: The Petal Kamellie
nodes.description: The Petal Kamellie is a classy solitaire ring that has modesty and exuberance. Its smooth, polished band looks good matched with eternity rings and wedding bands. Four delicate prongs hold the center stone in place while a hidden crown adds luster from the side and from below.

nodes.title: The Nicole
nodes.description: Presenting The Nicole, a hidden halo engagement ring designed for those who appreciate the beauty of subtlety and the elegance of fine details. Twin marquise diamonds add a touch of vintage charm, enhancing the overall elegance of the ring. The Nicole is an ideal choice for those who cherish subtlety, sophistication, and a touch of unexpected delight in their jewelry.

nodes.title: The Hearts Liv
nodes.description: The Hearts Liv is a breathtaking three-stone engagement ring that captures the essence of romance and elegance in every detail. The central stone is flanked by two exquisite heart-shaped diamonds, each reflecting its shimmering light and set in a design that's both classic and captivating. The Hearts Liv creates a dazzling display of brilliance and fire, making this ring a perfect choice for those seeking a symbol of love that's as meaningful as it is visually stunning.

nodes.title: The Madison
nodes.description: Unveil a world of timeless elegance with The Madison — a solitaire engagement ring designed for those who treasure simplicity yet demand excellence. With its sleek, minimalist design, The Madison places the spotlight firmly on the center stone, allowing its inherent beauty to captivate and enchant. Its understated grace serves as the perfect stage, ensuring that the diamond or gemstone you choose will sparkle with unparalleled clarity and fire. For moments that deserve more than words, let The Madison speak.

nodes.title: The Pave Sarah
nodes.description: Step into a world of radiance and elegance with The Pave Sarah. Designed for the modern romantic, this ring features a dazzling pave band that twinkles with every gesture. However, what truly sets The Pave Sarah apart is its high-profile setting — a distinctive design that not only elevates the centerpiece gem but also pairs seamlessly with other rings, making stacking a dream. Whether you're starting your stack or adding a standout piece to an existing collection, The Pave Sarah offers the perfect harmony of luxury and versatility.

nodes.title: The Robin
nodes.description: The Robin is a vintage nature-inspired engagement ring that whispers elegance and enchantment. This beautiful ring is a true masterpiece, adorned with ornate detailing on the band and side stones encased in graceful organic shapes. The gently sloping band cradles the center stone while the hidden halo adds an extra layer of brilliance and charm. Inspired by the grace and beauty of nature, The Robin captures the essence of endless love.

nodes.title: The Ellie
nodes.description: The Ellie is a unique, creative ring that looks like a plain solitaire from the front, but features a pave-set bridge, hidden halo, and prongs underneath the center stone. Perfect if you want some low-key decadence without drawing too much attention

nodes.title: The Lia
nodes.description: The Lia has a delicate but luxurious aesthetic. The trellis setting creates a beautiful harmony with its pave-set diamond accents. The rounded side stones add size and brilliance to a ring for a chic but head-turning setting. For a chunky ring head that slenderizes the hand, look at elongated shapes: oval, pear, etc.

nodes.title: The Low Profile Kamellie
nodes.description: Set with intricate pave diamonds, The Low Profile Kamellie blends the tastefully modern with a timeless classic. The hidden halo ensures there is sparkle coming in from every angle, highlighting your center stone and making it appear larger. The delicate design flatters the finger, while its low profile makes it practical for even the busiest hands.

nodes.title: The Pave Nelly
nodes.description: The Pave Nelly features a stunning hidden halo, subtly nestled beneath the center stone, amplifying its brilliance. The ring’s dazzling pave band is adorned with intricately set diamonds that shimmer with every movement, enhancing the overall sparkle and radiance. Whether you admire its architectural beauty or the luminous diamonds that wrap around your finger, this ring promises to leave a lasting impression. Perfect for brides who desire a ring that balances boldness with delicate, refined details.

nodes.title: The Samantha
nodes.description: The Samantha is a breathtaking engagement ring that smoothly combines contemporary design with romantic elegance. The hidden halo design adds an extra layer of sparkle and illumination while the gypsy-style band adds a sleek and contemporary look. Crafted from high-quality materials, The Samantha is built to last, symbolizing the enduring nature of your love and making it an exceptional choice for your proposal.

nodes.title: The Pave Alex
nodes.description: The Pave Alex is a hidden halo ring with a pave band and an opulent twist. Four prongs hold the center stone high, emphasizing its size as it floats above the band. A hidden halo goes around the four prongs, creating incredible sparkle - especially when the ring is in motion.

nodes.descriptionHtml: Similar to the single claw prongs but two prongs sit closely next to each other for extra protection.

nodes.title: Two-Tone
nodes.descriptionHtml: Create a unique look by mixing two metals. The head will be made in white gold and the band in your chosen metal.

nodes.title: 2mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: Euro Shank
nodes.descriptionHtml: A modern squared base for comfortable, stylish wear.

nodes.title: Pave Prongs
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra sparkle to your setting with diamonds on the prongs.

nodes.title: 75% Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band to go 75% around it.

nodes.title: All Around
nodes.descriptionHtml: Extend the diamonds on the band — all around.

nodes.title: Low Profile
nodes.descriptionHtml: The center stone is set close to the band, offering a sleek and practical design. A straight wedding band won’t fit with the ring.

nodes.title: 2.5mm Pave Band
nodes.descriptionHtml: Customize the band's width to your preference.

nodes.title: 6 Prongs (Round)
nodes.descriptionHtml: Add extra protection to the center stone with 6 prongs.

nodes.title: Remove Hidden Halo
nodes.descriptionHtml: Remove the feature of smaller diamonds underneath the center stone (The setting design won’t change).

nodes.title: Compass
nodes.descriptionHtml: A compass prong setting has four prongs aligned with the cardinal directions, highlighting the stone's beauty.

nodes.title: Bezel
nodes.descriptionHtml: A bezel setting surrounds the stone with a metal rim, providing a secure and modern look.

nodes.title: Reverse Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: A striking fusion of contemporary allure and bold design, with intricately set diamonds along a widening band.

nodes.title: Tapered Pave
nodes.descriptionHtml: Delicately set diamonds along a gracefully narrowing band.

nodes.title: The Parker
nodes.description: The Parker is a stunning three-stone half-bezel engagement ring that blends strength with sophistication. Its unique setting cradles the diamond securely while the two baguette side stones maximize brilliance. The cathedral-style design adds graceful height, making the ring both timeless and eye-catching. Discover the perfect balance of style and sentiment with The Parker today.

nodes.title: The Dianne
nodes.description: The Dianne dazzles with a soaring cathedral silhouette that lifts the center stone into the spotlight. Its broader band makes a bold statement, while the fine milgrain detailing along the shank and basket weaves an ornate lace of metal that shimmers with every turn. Gleaming from every angle, The Dianne promises a radiant, heirloom-worthy sparkle that elevates any moment into pure glamor.

nodes.title: The Pave Twig
nodes.description: Our signature The Pave Twig seamlessly blends classic elegance with the inspiring beauty of nature. The luxurious pave setting illuminates every movement with a dazzling display of fire and light while the 1.5mm band has natural curves and textured details that perfectly capture the essence of a delicate twig. The effect is nothing short of mesmerizing, with a unique and romantic design that is sure to capture hearts.

nodes.title: The Three Stone Twig
nodes.description: Introducing The Three Stone Twig, an engagement ring that personifies timeless love and the beauty of nature. The central stone is flanked by two smaller pear-cut diamonds, creating a harmonious and balanced trio that symbolizes the past, present, and future of your relationship. The band is a true masterpiece, adorned with accent diamonds and styled to mimic a gently twisted branch. Embrace the elegance of nature and the brilliance of diamonds with this one-of-a-kind ring.

nodes.title: The Pave Margot
nodes.description: Illuminate your most cherished moments with the brilliance of The Pave Margot engagement ring. The pave band, laden with shimmering diamonds, is just the beginning of the luminous journey. The true distinction lies in the pave diamonds seamlessly set into the prongs, amplifying the sparkle from every perspective and ensuring a radiant display of affection. Dive into a realm of major sparkle, where each diamond mirrors the countless precious moments you share.

nodes.title: The Naomi
nodes.description: Introducing The Naomi engagement ring, a modern masterpiece guaranteed to garner an avalanche of compliments. This stunning ring features a simple yet sophisticated band with elegantly decorated shoulders, perfectly complemented by dazzling round and pear-cut side stones. The pièce de résistance is the opulent hidden halo, adding an extra touch of brilliance and luxury. The Naomi is the epitome of contemporary elegance, making it a perfect choice for those who desire a ring that is both stylish and timeless.

nodes.title: The Mandy
nodes.description: The Mandy pave-set engagement ring features a stunning hidden halo with round-cut diamonds. A garnished semi-band is pave-set in a delicate band, framing the center stone. Perfect if you're looking for a combination of sparkle and refinement.

nodes.title: The Stacey
nodes.description: The Stacey engagement ring is designed to captivate. The intertwined shank is expertly crafted from a smooth band and a pave band, creating a seamless flow that leads to a hidden halo. With its intricate details and opulent design, The Stacey becomes a true statement of elegance. It symbolizes enduring love and commitment, making it the perfect choice for the one who means the most.

nodes.title: The Pave Natalie
nodes.description: The Pavé Natalie is a beautifully refined engagement ring designed to dazzle. Featuring a pavé-set bridge, it radiates brilliance with diamonds extending all the way to the center stone. A delicate hidden halo nestles beneath four prongs, offering a touch of side sparkle that enhances the luster and visual impact of the center diamond. With its graceful design and shimmering details, the Pavé Natalie is the perfect symbol of a love that shines endlessly.

nodes.title: The Elizabeth
nodes.description: The Elizabeth engagement ring is a timeless blend of vintage charm and modern style. Its engraved vine pattern, framed by delicate milgrain detailing, adds a touch of old-world romance, while the narrow band creates a graceful, elongated look on the hand. Designed to enhance your center stone, its four delicate prongs maximize brilliance, making your diamond appear even larger. Perfect for those who appreciate refined beauty, The Elizabeth is a stunning symbol of love that will never go out of style.
